body.name: Dash Cam WiFi FHD 1080P Car Camera, Front Dash Camera for Cars, Mini Dashcams for Cars with Night Vision, 24 Hours Parking Mode, WDR, Loop Recording, G-Sensor, APP, Support 128GB Max
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 1 hr 45 mins
features: 【FHD 1080P Dash Cam】Recording FHD 1920X1080P/30 fps video with advanced GC CMOS + 150° wide angle + 6G lens, clearly capture the license plates as well as road signs during the day and night. Perfect mini dash camera for cars, truck, SUV, provides the most important evidence for car accidents.

【Built-in 2.4G WiFi & APP Control】This delicated car camera comes with APP for Android or iOS smartphones to get a live stream, download videos, change settings, edit and share your footage simple. Footages can be shared easily to YouTube, Twitter, Facebook, or the social media platform with the tap of a finger, allowing you to share any journey with all of your friends.

【Compact & Super Easy to Install】With slim and compact design (Size: 3.5x1.8x1.4in), the dashcam takes up tiny space in your car, which won't obstruct your vision while driving. And simple installation and set up with excellent instructions included, no need to worry even for a first time user.

【24 Hours Parking Mode】Mini USB hardwire kit(ASIN: B0BFFGCMDZ, not included) is required for this function. This dashcams will auto switch to parking mode while your car is parked. Collision detection can be triggered by impact or collision, and time lapse recording keeps recording continuously with low power consumption and low frame rate. If your vehicle is involved in a hit while parked, or someone attempts to steal your vehicle, this dash cam will provide around-the-clock protection.

【Seamless Loop Recording & G-sensor】When the storage limit is reached on the memory card, new recordings will automatically overwrite oldest recordings. Triggered by G-sensor, it can automatically detect a sudden shake/collision and lock the footage to prevent the video from being overwrote even in loop recording.

【Heat- Resistant & 128GB Max Support】Made of the high quality PC and ABS materials, the working temperature is from -4℉ to 167℉ (-20℃ to 75℃). With high heat resistance chipset and adhesive pad, the dash camera can work fine and stay attached to windshield even on hot sun. Supports up to 128GB microSD cards. The PNY microSD card (ASIN: B09B1JFY24, not included) is recommended.
body.description: Experience the simpleness with Arifayz Q3 Dash Cam Get your driving under control Warm Tips: The mount can be rotated 360° to get a best view of the road. It's also designed to be removed easily from camera body.Please format the SD card into FAT32 format on computer if you fail to format it on APP.When the memory card is inserted into the camera for the first time, it requires to be formatted on APP.Q3 dash cam has 24-Hours Parking Mode. Mini USB hardwire kit(ASIN: B0BFFGCMDZ, not included) is required for this function. FHD 1080P 30fps Built-in Wifi & App Control Compact and Super Easy to Install Sensitive G-sensor Seamless Loop Recording 24-Hours Parking Monitor - Hardwire Kit Required, NOT Included in the packaging, Purchase separately.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Arifayz Q3 Dashcam Front FHD 1080P with WiFi--Compact and Super Easy to Install FHD 1080P( 1920*1080P, 30FPS) Full High Definition, Super Night Vision - Equipped with advanced GC CMOS + 150° wide-angle + 6G lens, accurately captures crystal-clear video during the day and night, and provides the most important evidence for car accidents.Built-in WiFi - Easily access videos with App (IOS/Android available), provides a convenient way to view, download, share the footage. The APP allows you to easily share the video with your friends or family on social media such as YouTube, Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, Pinterest, TikTok, and many more.Compact & Super Easy to Install - With slim and compact design (Size: 3.5x1.8x1.4in), the dashcam takes up tiny space in your car, which won't obstruct your vision while driving. And simple installation and set up with excellent instructions included, no need to worry even for a first time user. MOST IMPORTANTLY: A memory card is NOT included in the packaging. Max Support 128 GB Micro SD Card. (Search ASIN: B08RG6XJZD) ✔ The dash cam has certain requirements on the card speed of the memory card. Please search PNY Class 10, U3 Speed Micro-SD Memory Card. ✘ Please DON'T USE any "SanDisk Ultra" or other "Generic Class 10" Cards from third-party sellers. They are NOT made for high write and read speed for Q3 dash cam.

Safer Insurance for your Car We design our dash cam perfectly meet the needs of drivers with the powerful and practical features. Here, your satisfaction means the world to us. We devote ourself to the customers. Care about what you say, do what you request and improve what you suggest. Customers is priority. Package Content: 1 x Q3-1080P Dash Cam 1 x User Manual & Registration Card 1 x Car Charger 1 x Adhesive Pad 1 x Electrostatic Film 1 x Car Wiring Trim Tool 5 x Cable Hiding Clips Experience the simpleness with Arifayz Q3 Dash Cam Get your driving under control Warm Tips: The mount can be rotated 360° to get a best view of the road. It's also designed to be removed easily from camera body.Please format the SD card into FAT32 format on computer if you fail to format it on APP.When the memory card is inserted into the camera for the first time, it requires to be formatted on APP.Q3 dash cam has 24-Hours Parking Mode. Mini USB hardwire kit(ASIN: B0BFFGCMDZ, not included) is required for this function. FHD 1080P 30fps Built-in Wifi & App Control Compact and Super Easy to Install Sensitive G-sensor Seamless Loop Recording 24-Hours Parking Monitor - Hardwire Kit Required, NOT Included in the packaging, Purchase separately.

1080P Full High Definition Resolution Simultaneous recording with Super High Resolution 1080P@30fps Full HD Lens, and advanced GC CMOS + 6G lens deliver clearer videos&images and replay the key moment even when high speed driving. 150° Wide-Angle Lens This car driving recorder employs 150° super wide angle lens. Ultra-wide field of view reduces the blind spots and captures more details, to reserve the real scene. G-sensor With built-in G-sensor, Q3 dashboard camera can automatically detect a sudden shake/collision and lock the footage to prevent the video from being overwritten even in loop recording. Accident scene can be truly restored.

Loop Recording The loop recording function makes the dash cam overwrite the oldest videos when the SD card is full, so the dash cam can achieve continues recording. You can set the video file length from 1,2,3 min by settings. Custom Voice Anouncement The voice broadcast function helps you know the current status of the dash camera. One example and most important one is letting you know if the impact reaches its set G-sensor level, the camera will lockes it, and saves in Emergency Locked Folder. Parking Monitor & 24 Hours Recording Parking Monitor: When the dash cam detects a collision happens, it will auto power on then record a protected video.24 Hours recording: the dashcam will go on recording after your car is parked. After you connect the dash cam to your fuse box via our dash cam hardwire kit, please make sure you have turned on the Time Lapse Recording or normal recording, otherwise it won't go on recording after you shut down your car. Both functions require continuous power and Hard Wire Kit (NOT included in package). Please search B0BFFGCMDZ and connect the hardwire kit to you fuse box.

Here are few Frequently Asked Questions and quick tips to get started: 1. Q: Why can't I view the live video on the APP? A: The cellular data will cause the live feed not to be viewed. Please disable the "Peztio" cellular data of your cellphone. Setting→Peztio→Disable the "Cellular Data". 2. Q: Can't connect WiFi or connect failed? A: Please remember to authorize the App with the album, location, WLAN & cellulardata and turn off the VPN, security software and anti-virus APP of your mobile phone, otherwise you will not be able to connect to wifi. 3. Q: Why doesn't WiFi connected automatically? A: Let me explain to you why we set the wifi to need to be connected manually instead of automatically connect the wifi as soon as it is turned on. Since many mobile phones on the market are single-channel mobile phones, the SIM card cannot be used after connecting to WiFi. We are worried that the automatic opening and connection of WiFi will cause some mobile phones to be unable to use 4/5G and miss important information. 4. Q: How to activate this dash cam's parking monitoring function? A: Q3 support 24 hours recording only when it is connected to a mini USB hardwire kit (not included in the package), please search B0BFFGCMDZ and connect the hardwire kit to you fuse box.

Specification Video Resolution 1080P/720P-30fps front only Viewing Angle/Aperture 150°/F1.5 Operating temperature -4 to 167°F Playback Method PC (VLC Player) / Smartphone (Peztio APP) Battery & Charging NO battery; Cigarette Lighter or Hard Wire, DC5V/1A Storage 128GB microSD card max. PNY Class 10, U3 Speed SD Card (Search ASIN: B08RG87JN5) Main Features APP control; Loop recording(1/2/3min); G-sensor; 24H Parking monitoring(Time-lapse,Hardwire kit is needed ) ; WDR; Night vision; Voice Broadcast; Parking Monitor You will need to install car dash cam with a hardwire kit (Please search B0BFFGCMDZ), The camera will get continuous power for safe parking recording. Arifayz User Manual Arifayz provide updates for dash cam Firmware, PDF user manual, registration card and camera accessories.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing customer support - I highly reccomend!
reviews.reviewText: This camera seems to be a really good, basic dash cam. It's small, intuitive, and sold at a great price. The video is good the sound is good and it has all of the basic functionality you'd expect. Where this camera really shines compared to other cams I've had though, is in the instructions, customer service and app. The instruction manual is thorough, has large print and is written in clean, proper english. The app is the same; very intuitive, simple and not jankey at all (unlike most of the other camera apps I've used). Customer service reached out immediately after I bought the cam and gave me contact information in case I needed any help setting it up. That really went a long way with me. All in all, I think this a very solid dash cam, and the customer support is excellent. I don't think you can go wrong with this one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars High quality and great video!
reviews.reviewText: I own a Q3 and a Q4 dash camera. I have had the Q3 for over a year and it has worked reliably. Both the Q3 and the Q4 are very easy to install and the products come with everything you need to install. The companion app is extremely easy to use.I have found the video to be sharp and clear on both the Q3 and the Q4.I highly recommend either unit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good budget dashcam
reviews.reviewText: I bought this cam because it was on offer. It was easy to setup. As this was a replacement to my old cam which I already have the fixed wires connected, it was simply remove the old and plug in the new. With a convenient Wi-Fi connection, I can get to stream the video feed to my phone. Bought 3 more as gifts for my relatives. Decent video quality for what I paid which I think is good enough for any insurance claim or evidence for the cops.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple, easy, affordable and good
reviews.reviewText: I didn’t think it would be as simple as it was to get this camera up and running! The user manual is easy to read and good at explaining the set up so I had it set up in no time. It’s affordable and actually good camera quality and I’m already thinking of buying another one for my other car! It’s not huge so it won’t be a distraction, also I like that it records in loops of a minute or you can actually change it to 2 minutes or 3 in the app. The app is also easy to use, I would definitely recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Unquestionable performance and reliability
reviews.reviewText: I am very pleased with the ARIFAYZ Dash Cam WiFi FHD 1080P Car Camera. I was expecting a mediocre video based upon pricing of the camera. I am pleasantly pleased with the quality of the videos. The installation was very easy and straight forward. There was no difficulty hiding the power cable in the door and window trim. Once it's connected, it performs faultlessly. The night vision works well and even in dark unlighted roadways your headlights provide a decent video. Additionally the customer support is second to none. I have a RAV4 and realized the adapter plug provided took more space than I was willing to give up. A quick email and within days I was provided a USB adapter cord which solved my problem. I would not hesitate to recommend this company for any product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It Does Its Job
reviews.reviewText: Overall, the dash cam does a great job at what it needs to do. As long as you spend time reading the provided manual booklet (which takes about 5-10 minutes to read) or at least skim through it, then setting up and using the product is easy.Pros:- Great price (based on the other dash cams available on Amazon)- Quick and responsive customer support; even provided a follow up email checking on whether I got my requested USB cable replacement (which was free!)- Easy to set up- Camera provides decent film qualityCons:- Doesn't come with required chip (have to buy it individually from elsewhere on Amazon, etc.)- Doesn't come with USB cable (have to ask customer support)- NOT WIRELESS (cord can be a hassle if you're not willing to decorate the cord around the inside of your car)Besides the cons, some other minor areas for improvement would be adding more of those wiring clips for the dashcam wire and providing substitute tape for the clips. I found 5 clips to not be enough for me to hold the wire around the inside of my car and when I had to peel off the clips to move them around, the tape ripped, so I'm planning to place adhesive tape over them to get the clips to stick again. Nevertheless, these cons/areas of improvement are not a major burden to me.But again, great product and would recommend buying this product if you're looking to just have a dash cam for your car.

reviews.reviewTitle: Easy to install and good quality
reviews.reviewText: I like the product … small size …high quality video recording …

great camera, very simple to install and configure. the app is pretty easy to use. I bought two cameras as i have two cars; work and pleasure, app works great between two cameras in two cars. i wanted a basic forward looking camera and it fits the spot. it would be nice if in the box it came with a hardwire kit.

Got this as my second Dashcam for our second car. I prefer cams without video screens since i never review the footage on it. This one sits behind the rear view mirror and is completely out of sight. However, this cam also has a small information screen, which is great because it just shows instant info at a glance: recording status, audio status, wifi status, card status and the clock. You can set a setting to turn the screen off after a timeout. The quality of the video is very good day and night. You can clearly see all the details, no shaking. Downloaded videos (which you download by connecting with your phone to the camera's wifi) are saved in your album and are playable/shareable right away. Very happy so far!

reviews.reviewTitle: Easy Installation, High Video Recording Clarity, Easy Setup
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I wanted to take a moment to share my experience with the 'Arifayz' Dashcam that I recently installed in my car.I am thoroughly impressed with this product and felt compelled to give it a well-deserved 5-star rating! First off, the video recording quality is great with a clear 1080p resolution. The installation process was a breeze, thanks to the easy-to-follow instructions and the included glue clippers, which help in neatly hiding the wiring. I also appreciate the thoughtful inclusion of a transparent sticker to prevent any glue damage to the glass when mounting the camera. The customer support provided is excellent, with helpful video tutorials that guide you through the installation process. The accompanying application is a fantastic feature, allowing you to control various settings such as recording length, video resolution, and even download videos and photos directly from the device. Moreover, the dashcam comes with a 24-hour parking mode system, night vision, and G-sensors, all of which add to the sense of security and functionality of the product.Overall, I'm extremely happy with the 'Arifayz' Dashcam and would highly recommend it to anyone in the market for a reliable car dashcam.

I got extended support from the seller, it is very easy to set up and the video quality is very clear as well,the seller is easy to contact and very helpfull, they contact to check if I have any issues and also gave me free support warranty for 3 years. Very good product and the company. Best buy so far
